patthana22.32:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:2.1_2: adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:4.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:5.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:6.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:7.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:8.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nacittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:8.1_2: adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:9.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:10.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nacittavisaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho cittavisaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:10.1_2: adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:11.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:12.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:13.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
patthana22.32:14.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:15.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nocittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
patthana22.32:16.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanocittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:17.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:18.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:19.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:20.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:21.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:22.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:23.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:24.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:25.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:25.1_2: adhipatiyā pañcatiṁsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa.
patthana22.32:26.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanoupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:27.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe cha,
patthana22.32:27.1_1: anantare tīṇi …pe… upanissaye cha …pe… āhāre aṭṭhārasa, avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana22.32:28.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:28.1_2: sahajāte nissaye kamme …pe… magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekavīsa.
